All version SDv1.9, SDv2.0 and SDv2.1 work perfectly. I've alway do these steps:
- Install Sleeping.Dogs-SKIDROW (must be)
- Install Sleeping.Dogs.v1.8.Update-SKIDROW (must be).
- Update Sleeping Dogs v1.9.Update.incl.All.DLC's-P2P. Copy all files and past to folder where the game is installed, then run Patch.v1.8_to_v1.9.bat. no need to crack.
- Udate Sleeping Dogs.Update v.2.0..Incl.All.DLC's-P2P. Do the same way as above step.
- update Sleeping Dogs.Update v.2.1..Incl.All.DLC's-P2P Do the same way as above step. Now, copy all files of crack and paste to where the game is installed. Do  another way it doesn't work.

@ THANGDL:
That's why the question is, what do you do if you already have and older already cracked version. Will the updater work properly or will it only modify some of the files and the result will be an unplayable game?

@puple! 
When i had SDv1.8, or 1.9.. i just did as Gh0sNet's instruction, (when the game was cracked). When  running SD_update_xxxx.bat it will modify some files to fix all for running as new version. When i do something wrong, i reinstall Sleeping.Dogs.v1.8.Update-SKIDROW only. Then i do everything again. That mean these updates are modify ones, on need to uninstall.
That mean these updates are modifications. No need to uninstall.
